html{font-size:14px;line-height:normal;overflow-x:scroll}.loginWallpaper{background-attachment:fixed;background-image:url(__VITE_ASSET__Cj7ZcAKH__);background-position:50%;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:cover}.backgroundWallpaper{background:url(__VITE_ASSET__WF3EMFKx__) no-repeat 50% fixed;background-size:cover}.p-float-label label{margin-top:-.8rem}.primary-color-text{color:var(--primary-color)}.p-toast .p-toast-message .p-toast-message-content{border:0}.p-inputtext.p-invalid.p-component{border-style:solid}.p-panel.no-header .p-panel-header{display:none}.p-datatable .p-datatable-thead>tr>th{padding:.5rem 1rem!important}.p-panel-content{padding:.25rem}.p-button:not(.p-button-icon-only){padding:.65rem 1.15rem!important}.p-datepicker table td{padding:.1rem}.p-datepicker .p-datepicker-buttonbar,.p-datepicker .p-datepicker-header,.p-datepicker .p-datepicker-title button{padding:.25rem 0}.p-button-label{font-weight:500}.p-datatable-footer{font-size:12px;font-weight:500;padding:.5rem 1rem!important}.p-datatable .p-tag-value{font-size:.85rem}.p-dropdown-panel .p-dropdown-header{padding:.5rem!important}.p-button-group.p-button-secondary>.p-button,.p-button.p-button-secondary,.p-splitbutton.p-button-secondary>.p-button{background:#f1f5f9;border:1px solid #f1f5f9;color:#475569}.p-rowgroup-footer td,.p-rowgroup-header td{padding:.5rem 1rem}body,html{background-color:#f9fbfd;overflow-x:hidden;padding:0;width:100%}*{box-sizing:border-box!important}.hidden{height:0;opacity:0;overflow:hidden;visibility:hidden}.hidden,.visible{transition:opacity .3s ease}.visible{height:auto;opacity:1;visibility:visible}tabltable{cursor:pointer;overflow-x:auto;table-layout:auto!important;width:100%!important}table td,table th{border:1px solid #ddd;color:#fff;font-size:12px!important;letter-spacing:1px;padding:4px!important;text-align:center!important;word-wrap:break-word;min-width:60px;overflow-wrap:break-word;white-space:normal;word-break:break-all}@media (max-width:768px){table td,table th{font-size:10px!important;padding:8px!important}table td:nth-child(n+17),table th:nth-child(n+17){display:none}}@media (max-width:480px){table td,table th{font-size:10px!important;padding:5px!important}table td:nth-child(n+11),table th:nth-child(n+11){display:none}}table th{background-color:#3e3d3d;box-shadow:0 2px 2px -1px rgba(0,0,0,.4);color:#f1f1ff;top:0;z-index:1}#graficos,.table,table th{position:sticky;width:auto}#graficos canvas{max-height:400px;width:auto}#graficos{display:none}.firstCollumn{color:#181818!important}.btnTables{background-color:#2e86de;border:none;border-radius:4px;color:#e2e8ee;cursor:pointer;font-size:1rem;margin-bottom:20px;padding:10px}.btnTables:hover{background-color:#194877}table span.pontosGraficos{display:block;margin-top:15px;right:1}.highlight{box-shadow:inset 0 0 5px 6px #000}table tr td:nth-last-child(-n+6){color:#000;font-weight:700}table th:first-child,table tr:first-child{border:none!important}table tr:first-child td,table tr:first-child th{border:none}table tr td:nth-child(11),table tr td:nth-child(16),table tr td:nth-child(6),table tr th:nth-child(11),table tr th:nth-child(16),table tr th:nth-child(6){border-right:5px solid #2d0bf1!important}.percentCell{color:#000;font-weight:700;text-align:center}.green{background-color:#28a745}.red{background-color:#dc3545}.text-green{color:#28a745!important;font-size:.95rem!important}.text-red{color:#dc3545!important;font-size:.7rem!important}#tabelaambasmediaColunaSubidas,#tabelao25mediaColunaDescidas,#tabelao25mediaColunaGols,#tabelao25mediaColunaLateralizacoesOver,#tabelao25mediaColunaLateralizacoesUnder,#tabelao25mediaColunaPorcentagens,.somaGolsCell{font-size:.95rem!important}.somaGolsCell{color:#000;padding:0}
